channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA

item.title: Report E-2024120456
item.description:
Report E-2024120456

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-12
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Carus Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Carus Corporation contacted ERTS requesting assistance with retorquing 95-5 gallon jerricans containing UN3214 Organic Peroxide CIRCUSPOSIT 3308A 51. It was reported that 3-4 of the pails were leaking due to loose caps. Clean Harbors was dispatched to the site. Four jerricans were identified as leaking. The caps were tightened and tested for leakage. Clean Harbors wiped down the impacted jerricans, but was unable to tighten one Jerrican cap. The impacted pallet, rags, and damaged jerrican were containerized into two, 55-gallon poly drums for proper disposal.
